# XCLV

> XCLV is an investment company that invests in visionary geniuses when nobody else will. Founded by V. Konovalov.

## About XCLV

XCLV is an investment company founded by V. Konovalov. The company's mission is investing in visionary geniuses â€” when nobody else will. XCLV identifies and backs extraordinary founders and builders at the earliest stages, before consensus forms around their potential.

The company focuses on high-conviction investments in individuals with outsized vision and the determination to reshape industries. XCLV operates with the belief that the most transformative opportunities are found where others see only risk.

## Founder

V. Konovalov is the founder and CEO of XCLV. He can be reached at ceo@xclv.com.

## Contact
